summary.span: 命名空间包含用于定义不可变集合的接口和类。

span.span: The namespace contains interfaces and classes that define immutable collections.

summary.span: 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 开始，已支持使用这些类。

span.span: These classes are supported starting with [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].

summary.span: 使用这些类可以生成面向桌面、[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)] 和 Windows Phone 8 的应用程序。

span.span: Use them to build apps that target the desktop, [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)] and Windows Phone 8.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用不可变集合，你可以：With immutable collections, you can: - 共享集合，使其使用者可以确保集合永远不会发生更改。Share a collection in a way that its consumer can be assured that the collection never changes. - 提供多线程应用程序中的隐式线程安全（无需锁来访问集合）。Provide implicit thread safety in multi-threaded applications (no locks required to access collections). - 遵循函数编程做法。Follow functional programming practices. - 在枚举过程中修改集合，同时确保该原始集合不会更改。Modify a collection during enumeration, while ensuring that the original collection does not change. .NET Core 提供了不可变的集合类，但它们不是随 .NET Framework 一起分发的核心类库的一部分。The immutable collection classes are available with .NET Core, however they're not part of the core class library distributed with the .NET Framework. 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，可以通过 NuGet 开始使用。They're available starting with the .NET Framework 4.5 via NuGet. 通过 NuGet 安装不可变集合：To install the immutable collections via NuGet: 1. 在 Visual Studio 中打开项目，然后从 **“项目”** 菜单中选择 **“管理 NuGet 包”**。Open your project in Visual Studio and choose **Manage NuGet Packages** from the **Project** menu. 2. 还可以选择 "**包括预发行**版" 复选框。Optionally, select the **Include prerelease** checkbox. 在不可变类可用时，此选项将提供对新预发布版本的不可变类的访问。This option will give you access to new prerelease versions of the immutable classes, as they become available. 3. 使用 "**搜索**" 框找到 "" **。**Use the **Search** box to locate the **System.Collections.Immutable** package. 4. 在左窗格中，选择 " **system.web** " 包。In the left pane, select the **System.Collections.Immutable** package. 在右侧窗格中，选择所需的版本，然后选择 "安装"。In the right pane, select the desired version and then choose Install. 上述安装步骤适用于 Visual Studio 2015。The installation steps described above are for Visual Studio 2015. 对于其他版本的 Visual Studio，这些步骤可能稍有不同，因为用户界面（UI）存在差异。For other versions of Visual Studio, the steps might be slightly different because of differences in the user interface (UI).
